ja51:1.1: A good king deposed by a violent foe is subjected to brutal torture, but neither slips from his virtue nor loses hope. Persevering, he eventually regains the crown. | _Āsīsetha_ is reflexive third singular optative.
ja51:1.4: _Ahūti_ is _ahu_ + _(i)ti_, where _ahu_ is reflexive first singular aorist.
